statements.statement:
select a.*, b.TINHTRANG_BHTN, d.TINHTRANG AS TINHTRANG_MG, C.NOIYEUCAU_ID , g.GIATRIMIENGIAM_CTCT, g.TINHTRANG_MGCT, c.HUYYEUCAU , b.MIENGIAMCHITIET_ID, d.GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH, f.GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN , b.VIENPHI_MGTN, b.REF_TABLE_MGTN from ( select VP.* from TT_VIENPHI VP where VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN > 0
VP.VIENPHI_ID in ($LIST_VIENPHI$)
VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN in ($LIST_BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN$)
VP.VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$'
VP.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
VP.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
VP.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
VP.REF_ID = '$REF_ID$'
VP.REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
VP.DICHVU_ID is NULL
(DUOC_ID = '0' or DUOC_ID is NULL)
VP.LOAI_CHIPHI = '$LOAI_CHIPHI$'
VP.LOAIGIA_ID = '$LOAIGIA_ID$'
VP.SOLUONG = '$SOLUONG$'
VP.DONGIA_DOANHTHU = '$DONGIA_DOANHTHU$'
VP.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = '$THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU$'
VP.BHYT_TL = '$BHYT_TL$'
VP.BHYT_DONGIA = '$BHYT_DONGIA$'
VP.BHYT_THANHTIEN = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN$'
VP.BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA = '$BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA$'
VP.BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = '$BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN$'
VP.GIATRI_HOADON = '$GIATRI_HOADON$'
VP.GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN$'
VP.GIATRI_BIENLAI = '$GIATRI_BIENLAI$'
VP.GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN$'
VP.GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN$'
VP.GIATRI_THATTHU = '$GIATRI_THATTHU$'
VP.MIENGIAM_TL = '$MIENGIAM_TL$'
VP.MIENGIAM_GIATRI = '$MIENGIAM_GIATRI$'
VP.NGANSACH_TL = '$NGANSACH_TL$'
VP.NGANSACH_GIATRI = '$NGANSACH_GIATRI$'
VP.TAITRO_TL = '$TAITRO_TL$'
VP.TAITRO_GIATRI = '$TAITRO_GIATRI$'
VP.BHTN_TL = '$BHTN_TL$'
VP.BHTN_DONGIA = '$BHTN_DONGIA$'
VP.BHTN_THANHTIEN = '$BHTN_THANHTIEN$'
VP.BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA = '$BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA$'
VP.BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
VP.DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = '$DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN$'
VP.HUY = '$HUY$'
VP.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$'
VP.DATHUCHIEN = '$DATHUCHIEN$'
VP.KHONGTHUTIEN = '$KHONGTHUTIEN$'
VP.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$'
VP.ACTIVE = '$ACTIVE$'
VP.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
VP.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
VP.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
VP.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
VP.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
CONVERT(date, NGAYTAO) IN ($LISTDATE$)
)a left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG as TINHTRANG_BHTN, MGCT.MIENGIAMCHITIET_ID, mgct.VIENPHI_ID as VIENPHI_MGTN , mgct.REF_TABLE as REF_TABLE_MGTN from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN'
MG.TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
)b on a.VIENPHI_ID = b.VIENPHI_ID
left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG,sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH from TT_MIENGIAM MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM' and MG.TINHTRANG = '1' group by VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG )d on a.VIENPHI_ID = d.VIENPHI_ID
left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN from TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )f on a.VIENPHI_ID = f.VIENPHI_ID left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG as TINHTRANG_MGCT, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_CTCT from TT_MIENGIAM_CONGTY MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_CONGTY_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_CONGTY' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG )g on a.VIENPHI_ID = g.VIENPHI_ID
left join ( select DVYEUCAU_ID, TRANGTHAI, BHYTDONGTIEN,HUYYEUCAU, NOIYEUCAU_ID from TT_DVYEUCAU
TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
HUYYEUCAU = '$HUYYEUCAU$'
)c on c.DVYEUCAU_ID = a.REF_ID
c.HUYYEUCAU = '$HUYYEUCAU$' or c.HUYYEUCAU is null

select a.*, b.TINHTRANG_BHTN, d.TINHTRANG AS TINHTRANG_MG, C.NOIYEUCAU_ID , g.GIATRIMIENGIAM_CTCT, g.TINHTRANG_MGCT, c.HUYYEUCAU ,b.MIENGIAMCHITIET_ID, d.GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH as GIATRIMIENGIAM, f.GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN , b.VIENPHI_MGTN, b.REF_TABLE_MGTN from ( select VP.* from TT_VIENPHI VP where VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN >= 0
VP.VIENPHI_ID in ($LIST_VIENPHI$)
VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN in ($LIST_BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN$)
VP.VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$'
VP.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
VP.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
VP.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
VP.REF_ID = '$REF_ID$'
VP.REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
VP.DICHVU_ID is NULL
(DUOC_ID = '0' or DUOC_ID is NULL)
VP.LOAI_CHIPHI = '$LOAI_CHIPHI$'
VP.LOAIGIA_ID = '$LOAIGIA_ID$'
VP.SOLUONG = '$SOLUONG$'
VP.DONGIA_DOANHTHU = '$DONGIA_DOANHTHU$'
VP.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = '$THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU$'
VP.BHYT_TL = '$BHYT_TL$'
VP.BHYT_DONGIA = '$BHYT_DONGIA$'
VP.BHYT_THANHTIEN = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN$'
VP.BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA = '$BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA$'
VP.BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = '$BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN$'
VP.GIATRI_HOADON = '$GIATRI_HOADON$'
VP.GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN$'
VP.GIATRI_BIENLAI = '$GIATRI_BIENLAI$'
VP.GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN$'
VP.GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN$'
VP.GIATRI_THATTHU = '$GIATRI_THATTHU$'
VP.MIENGIAM_TL = '$MIENGIAM_TL$'
VP.MIENGIAM_GIATRI = '$MIENGIAM_GIATRI$'
VP.NGANSACH_TL = '$NGANSACH_TL$'
VP.NGANSACH_GIATRI = '$NGANSACH_GIATRI$'
VP.TAITRO_TL = '$TAITRO_TL$'
VP.TAITRO_GIATRI = '$TAITRO_GIATRI$'
VP.BHTN_TL = '$BHTN_TL$'
VP.BHTN_DONGIA = '$BHTN_DONGIA$'
VP.BHTN_THANHTIEN = '$BHTN_THANHTIEN$'
VP.BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA = '$BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA$'
VP.BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
VP.DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = '$DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN$'
VP.HUY = '$HUY$'
VP.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$'
VP.DATHUCHIEN = '$DATHUCHIEN$'
VP.KHONGTHUTIEN = '$KHONGTHUTIEN$'
VP.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$'
VP.ACTIVE = '$ACTIVE$'
VP.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
VP.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
VP.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
VP.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
VP.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
CONVERT(date, NGAYTAO) IN ($LISTDATE$)
)a left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG as TINHTRANG_BHTN, MGCT.MIENGIAMCHITIET_ID, mgct.VIENPHI_ID as VIENPHI_MGTN , mgct.REF_TABLE as REF_TABLE_MGTN from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN'
MG.TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
)b on a.VIENPHI_ID = b.VIENPHI_ID
left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG,sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH from TT_MIENGIAM MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM' and MG.TINHTRANG = '1' group by VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG )d on a.VIENPHI_ID = d.VIENPHI_ID
left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN from TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )f on a.VIENPHI_ID = f.VIENPHI_ID left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG AS TINHTRANG_MGCT, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_CTCT from TT_MIENGIAM_CONGTY MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_CONGTY_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_CONGTY' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID, MG.TINHTRANG )g on a.VIENPHI_ID = g.VIENPHI_ID left join ( select DVYEUCAU_ID, TRANGTHAI, BHYTDONGTIEN,HUYYEUCAU, NOIYEUCAU_ID from TT_DVYEUCAU
TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
HUYYEUCAU = '$HUYYEUCAU$'
)c on c.DVYEUCAU_ID = a.REF_ID
c.HUYYEUCAU = '$HUYYEUCAU$' or c.HUYYEUCAU is null
statements.insert:
select TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN ( MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID , SOPHIEUBHTN , TIEPNHAN_ID , BENHAN_ID , BENHNHAN_ID , CONGTYBHTN_ID , SOTHEBHTN , NGAYHIEULUC , NGAYHETHAN , TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA , GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA , LYDO_ID , NGUOIDUYET_ID , GHICHU , TINHTRANG , BENHVIEN_ID , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT ) values ( #ID# , #SOPHIEUBHTN# , #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #BENHAN_ID# , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #CONGTYBHTN_ID# , #SOTHEBHTN# , #NGAYHIEULUC# , #NGAYHETHAN# , #TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA# , #GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA# , #LYDO_ID# , #NGUOIDUYET_ID# , #GHICHU# , #TINHTRANG# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# )

insert into TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET ( MIENGIAM_ID , REF_TABLE , VIENPHI_ID , TYLEMIENGIAM , GIATRIMIENGIAM , BENHVIEN_ID , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , GIATRISAUMIENGIAM ) values ( #MIENGIAM_ID# , #REF_TABLE# , #VIENPHI_ID# , #TYLEMIENGIAM# , #GIATRIMIENGIAM# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #GIATRISAUMIENGIAM# )
statements.statement:
select * from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = '$MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.SOPHIEUBHTN = '$SOPHIEUBHTN$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.CONGTYBHTN_ID = '$CONGTYBHTN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.SOTHEBHTN = '$SOTHEBHTN$'
TRUNC(TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGAYHIEULUC) = TRUNC(#NGAYHIEULUC#)
TRUNC(TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGAYHETHAN) = TRUNC(#NGAYHETHAN#)
TRUNC(TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA) = TRUNC(#TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA#)
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA = '$GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGUOIDUYET_ID = '$NGUOIDUYET_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TRUNC(TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGAYCAPNHAT) = TRUNC(#NGAYCAPNHAT#)

select count(*) as SoLuong from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN MGTN left join TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT on MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID = MGTN.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID
MGTN.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = '$MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID$'
MGTN.SOPHIEUBHTN = '$SOPHIEUBHTN$'
MGTN.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
MGTN.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
MGTN.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
MGTN.CONGTYBHTN_ID = '$CONGTYBHTN_ID$'
MGTN.SOTHEBHTN = '$SOTHEBHTN$'
MGTN.NGAYHIEULUC = '$NGAYHIEULUC$'
MGTN.NGAYHETHAN = '$NGAYHETHAN$'
MGTN.TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA = '$TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA$'
MGTN.GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA = '$GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA$'
MGTN.NGUOIDUYET_ID = '$NGUOIDUYET_ID$'
MGTN.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
MGTN.TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
MGTN.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
MGTN.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
MGTN.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
MGTN.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
MGTN.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
MGTN.TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN = '$TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN$'
MGCT.VIENPHI_ID in ($LIST_VIENPHI$)
MGCT.VIENPHI_ID not in ($LIST_VIENPHI_UPDATE$)

select MG.* , TN.SOTIEPNHAN, BA.SOBENHAN, BN.TENBENHNHAN, BN.MAYTE , CASE NVL(TO_CHAR(BN.NGAYSINH),'') WHEN '' THEN TO_CHAR(BN.NAMSINH) ELSE TO_CHAR(BN.NGAYSINH,'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS NAMSINH ,gt.DESCRIPTION as GIOITINH from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN MG left join TT_TIEPNHAN TN on TN.TIEPNHAN_ID = MG.TIEPNHAN_ID left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN BA on BA.BENHAN_ID = MG.BENHAN_ID left join TT_BENHNHAN BN on BN.BENHNHAN_ID = MG.BENHNHAN_ID left join TM_GENDER gt on gt.ID = bn.GIOITINH
MG.SOPHIEUBHTN like '%$TUKHOA$%' or BN.TENBENHNHAN like '%$TUKHOA$%' or BN.MAYTE like '%$TUKHOA$%'
BN.TENBENHNHAN like '%$TUKHOA1$%' or BN.MAYTE like '%$TUKHOA1$%'
MG.SOPHIEUBHTN like '%$TUKHOA2$%'
(MG.NGUOIDUYET_ID = '$USER_ID$' or MG.NGUOITAO_ID = '$USER_ID$')
MG.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
MG.TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
TN.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TRUNC(MG.NGAYTAO) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
order by MG.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID DESC

select a.*, b.GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH, c.GIATRIMIENGIAM_CTCT, f.GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN, a.GIATRIMIENGIAM as GIATRIMIENGIAM_BHTN , d.NOIYEUCAU_ID from ( select VP.*, MGCT.MIENGIAMCHITIET_ID, MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM, MGCT.GIATRISAUMIENGIAM from TT_VIENPHI VP left join TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT on VP.VIENPHI_ID = MGCT.VIENPHI_ID
MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID = '$MIENGIAM_ID$'
MGCT.REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
VP.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
VP.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
VP.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$'
) a left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH from TT_MIENGIAM MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )b on a.VIENPHI_ID = b.VIENPHI_ID
left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_CTCT from TT_MIENGIAM_CONGTY MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_CONGTY_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '7122' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_CONGTY' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )c on a.VIENPHI_ID = c.VIENPHI_ID left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN from TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )f on a.VIENPHI_ID = f.VIENPHI_ID left join ( select DVYEUCAU_ID, TRANGTHAI, BHYTDONGTIEN,HUYYEUCAU, NOIYEUCAU_ID from TT_DVYEUCAU
TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
HUYYEUCAU = '$HUYYEUCAU$'
)d on d.DVYEUCAU_ID = a.REF_ID

delete from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = '$MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.SOPHIEUBHTN = '$SOPHIEUBHTN$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.CONGTYBHTN_ID = '$CONGTYBHTN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.SOTHEBHTN = '$SOTHEBHTN$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA = '$TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA = '$GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGUOIDUYET_ID = '$NGUOIDUYET_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'

delete from TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET
TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET.MIENGIAM_ID = '$MIENGIAM_ID$'
TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET.REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET.VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$'
select mg.*, ba.SOBENHAN from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN mg left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN ba on ba.BENHAN_ID = mg.BENHAN_ID where mg.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = '$MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID$' and mg.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
statements.update: update TT_VIENPHI set TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID# , REF_ID = #REF_ID# , REF_TABLE = #REF_TABLE# , DICHVU_ID = #DICHVU_ID# , DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# , LOAI_CHIPHI = #LOAI_CHIPHI# , LOAIGIA_ID = #LOAIGIA_ID# , SOLUONG = #SOLUONG# , DONGIA_DOANHTHU = #DONGIA_DOANHTHU# , THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = #THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU# , BHYT_TL = #BHYT_TL# , BHYT_DONGIA = #BHYT_DONGIA# , BHYT_THANHTIEN = #BHYT_THANHTIEN# , BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA = #BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA# , BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = #BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = #BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_HOADON = #GIATRI_HOADON# , GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN = #GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_BIENLAI = #GIATRI_BIENLAI# , GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN = #GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN = #GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_THATTHU = #GIATRI_THATTHU# , MIENGIAM_TL = #MIENGIAM_TL# , MIENGIAM_GIATRI = #MIENGIAM_GIATRI# , NGANSACH_TL = #NGANSACH_TL# , NGANSACH_GIATRI = #NGANSACH_GIATRI# , TAITRO_TL = #TAITRO_TL# , TAITRO_GIATRI = #TAITRO_GIATRI# , BHTN_TL = #BHTN_TL# , BHTN_DONGIA = #BHTN_DONGIA# , BHTN_THANHTIEN = #BHTN_THANHTIEN# , BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA = #BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA# , BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = #BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = #DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN# , HUY = #HUY# , DATHANHTOAN = #DATHANHTOAN# , DATHUCHIEN = #DATHUCHIEN# , KHONGTHUTIEN = #KHONGTHUTIEN# , HOADON_ID = #HOADON_ID# , ACTIVE = #ACTIVE# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

update TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET set MIENGIAM_ID = #MIENGIAM_ID# , VIENPHI_ID = #VIENPHI_ID# , TYLEMIENGIAM = #TYLEMIENGIAM# , GIATRIMIENGIAM = #GIATRIMIENGIAM# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , GIATRISAUMIENGIAM = #GIATRISAUMIENGIAM# where MIENGIAMCHITIET_ID = '$MIENGIAMCHITIET_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

update TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN set
TIEPNHAN_ID=#TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHAN_ID=#BENHAN_ID# , BENHNHAN_ID=#BENHNHAN_ID# , CONGTYBHTN_ID=#CONGTYBHTN_ID# , SOTHEBHTN=#SOTHEBHTN# , NGAYHIEULUC= #NGAYHIEULUC# , NGAYHETHAN=#NGAYHETHAN# , TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA=#TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA# , GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA= #GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA# , NGUOIDUYET_ID=#NGUOIDUYET_ID# , GHICHU=#GHICHU# , TINHTRANG=#TINHTRANG# , LYDO_ID = #LYDO_ID#
, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID=#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT=#NGAYCAPNHAT# where MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = #MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID# and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

update TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN set SOPHIEUBHTN=#SOPHIEUBHTN# , TIEPNHAN_ID=#TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHAN_ID=#BENHAN_ID# , BENHNHAN_ID=#BENHNHAN_ID# , CONGTYBHTN_ID=#CONGTYBHTN_ID# , SOTHEBHTN=#SOTHEBHTN# , NGAYHIEULUC= #NGAYHIEULUC# , NGAYHETHAN=#NGAYHETHAN# , TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA=#TYLE_BHTN_CHITRA# , GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA= #GIATRI_BHTN_CHITRA# , NGUOIDUYET_ID=#NGUOIDUYET_ID# , NGAYDUYET = #NGAYDUYET# , GHICHU=#GHICHU# , TINHTRANG=#TINHTRANG# , BENHVIEN_ID=#BENHVIEN_ID# , NGUOITAO_ID= #NGUOITAO_ID# , NGAYTAO= #NGAYTAO# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID=#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT=#NGAYCAPNHAT# where MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = #MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID# and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
